HTMLQuestion.HTMLContent: <!doctype html><html lang="en"><head><meta charset="utf-8"/><link rel="icon" href="https://bsc2022-usageinfo-labelling-tool.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/favicon.ico"/><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1"/><meta name="theme-color" content="#000000"/><meta name="description" content="Web site created using create-react-app"/><link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="https://bsc2022-usageinfo-labelling-tool.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/logo192.png"/><link rel="manifest" href="https://bsc2022-usageinfo-labelling-tool.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/manifest.json"/><title>React App</title><script defer="defer" src="https://bsc2022-usageinfo-labelling-tool.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/static/js/main.4ccfe851.js"></script></head><body><noscript>You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.</noscript><script src="https://assets.crowd.aws/crowd-html-elements.js"></script><div id="source" style="display:none">"[\"Nice I liked to much\", \"Absolutely horrible, rough, thin and wrong size!!!! Cover is made of a disposable type of fabric. They measure 15 or 16&#34; at the MOST. These should be sold at Dollar Stores.\", \"My lashes naturally go different directions. I'm so glad I found this.Straightens up my lashes and makes them POP. They are super thick and dark. People think they're fake :) Product is easy to apply just be careful to not get anything in your eyes\", \"Excellent Book to read good story line well written I love them but I love just about anything Nora Roberts\", \"I wear ties everyday. Tired of spending 15-20 on a tie tack that pokes holes in my ties and the cheap chains always breaking. This fixes those problems and looks nicer. Highly recommended!\"]"</div><div id="metadata" style="display:none">[{"review_id": "R1UZRNBZEKT8K", "product_id": "B00EWKBPP8", "product_title": "Casio Electronic Cash Register", "review_date": "2014-07-01", "product_category": "Office Products"}, {"review_id": "RCQAUECCXM6IW", "product_id": "B000GOSUMA", "product_title": "Comi Cali Cool Everyday Pillow Covers 18\" X 18\"", "review_date": "2014-11-18", "product_category": "Home"}, {"review_id": "R3D89JN3LS9NFR", "product_id": "B00IJQDZTU", "product_title": "2 Sets (4 tubes) Love Alpha LA729 English Version (Gel & Fiber) Mascara Set - Brush on False Eyelashes", "review_date": "2015-05-28", "product_category": "Beauty"}, {"review_id": "R7O6J0L1WEA95", "product_id": "B003NX76BM", "product_title": "The Search", "review_date": "2014-01-14", "product_category": "Digital_Ebook_Purchase"}, {"review_id": "R2A8VCEK72B1FM", "product_id": "B00FP462DK", "product_title": "TIEALIGN 5 Pack - Invisible Tie Stays Made in the U.S.A.", "review_date": "2014-04-19", "product_category": "Apparel"}]</div><crowd-form><input name="annotations" id="annotations" type="hidden"/><crowd-button form-action="submit" style="display:none"></crowd-button></crowd-form><div id="root"></div><script>document.querySelector("crowd-form").onsubmit=function(){document.getElementById("annotations").value=JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(document.querySelector("pre").innerText))}</script></body></html>
